title: Virtual Assistant for Operations & Organization Across 3 Businesses (Email, SOPs, Google Drive)
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant for Operations & Organization Across 3 Businesses (Email, SOPs, Google Drive)

We’re hiring a proactive and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support daily operations across three of our businesses:

- Roaterra LLC (parent company)
- Vancillary (e-commerce van parts brand)
- Future Business Purchase (entertainment & events business)

If you’re highly organized, comfortable managing email communications, and love building efficient systems, we want to work with you!

???? What You’ll Do:

???? Email Management: Monitor multiple Gmail accounts daily. Flag priority messages, organize inboxes, and respond to basic customer service inquiries after training.

???? Create SOPs: Document repeatable processes like uploading products to Shopify, connecting with affiliates and builders, or designing new escape rooms. Help build a long-term training system for future teaUpgrade to see actual infombers.

????? Google Drive Organization: Maintain a clean, logical file system for Google Docs, photos, design files, and other content across all businesses.

? To-Do List Management: Help organize and manage the shared “To Do” list between the two founders, making sure tasks are tracked and followed up on.

???? General Admin Support: File attachments from email, assist with media library organization, draft templated replies, and more.

???? Skills & Qualities We’re Looking For

 • ? Prior experience as a Virtual Assistant or Executive Assistant
 • ? Excellent written and verbal English skills
 • ? Comfortable using Gmail, Google Drive, and Slack
 • ? Familiar/ Experienced with Shopify and supported apps
 • ? Familiar with SOP creation (in Google Docs, Notion, or other tools)
 • ? Detail-oriented, efficient, and reliable
 • ? Comfortable working with minimal supervision after onboarding
 • ? Able to suggest improvements and solve problems independently

? Work Hours
 • 10–20 hours per week to start
 • Flexible working hours, but must check emails at least two to three times per day and communicate via Slack daily
 • Available for occasional Zoom check-ins (1–2 times/week)

???? Compensation
 • $4–$8/hour depending on experience and skill set
 • Paid weekly via Wise

???? How to Apply:

- Send us a message with the subject line: “VA Application – Organized & Ready”
- Include a short paragraph (3–5 sentences) explaining:
- Why you’re a great fit for this role
- An example of a time you improved a system or process for someone else
- Share your resume and any relevant links (LinkedIn, online portfolio, etc.)
- (Optional but appreciated) Share a 1-minute Loom video introducing yourself
